subject: Simsonn control unit problems
description_text:
Hello,

I have one small provlem with control unit.
Ordered Pro X Ultra with haptic ram pro motors and I love it but after 10
minutes of driving motor on throttle pedal start working in full speed and
i cant stop it unless I unplug it from controller(motor 1 slot).When i
change motors example brake motor to motor 1 slot on controller the same
thing happens but now on brake pedal so the problem is in the main
controller.
When it happens unpluging and then plugging back in donest solve issue I
have to unplug it and leave it for 5 minutes then its okay for 10 minutes
and again.
Please help because I realy like the pedals and ram motor!

Thank you!

conversations.body_text: Hi Ante Klepo,  If this happens, it indicates that the computerâ€™s grounding is not reliable, possibly because a three-prong plug was not used with a three-prong wall outlet. You can refer to the post below: connect the computer case to the stand, and connect the control box to the metal screws on the pedals. This should resolve the disconnection issue.  https://github.com/SHWotever/SimHub/wiki/USB-Issues-Troubleshooting https://support.gomezsimindustries.com/portal/en/kb/articles/understanding-emi-and-grounding
